name: timeline
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool papercliff.
Tool description: Papercliff looks at the world's largest news agencies, reads articles, identifies and shares keywords
API description: Fetches the 100 most recent articles and their keywords using the Papercliff RapidAPI.

is_from.description: Narrows down the results to articles published after the provided date-time in UTC. The format should be `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm`. Example value: `2022-09-18T13:45`. Date-times older than a week do not affect the result.

terms.description: Narrows down the results to articles that contain all the provided keywords. The terms should consist of one to three words separated by a dash.  Example value: `election-campaign`.

offset.description: Omits a number of articles from the result.

to.description: Narrows down the results to articles published before the provided date-time in UTC. The format should be `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm`. Example value: `2022-09-18T15:30`. Date-times of the future do not affect the result.
